alert.note: Alert for Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Johnson County Higher Elevations; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 1:21PM CST until January 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to occasionally heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of one to two inches with locally higher amounts. * WHERE...Higher elevations in the Ozarks. * WHEN...From 4 AM to noon CST Friday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Be sure to check road conditions before traveling in these areas. Visit the Arkansas Department of Transportation`s website Idrivearkansas.com for the latest road and traffic conditions. For more information from the National Weather Service visit http://weather.gov/lzk
